files.Title: Jitter2.CallbackThreadAttribute
files.Summary: Indicates the thread context in which a callback or event is expected to be invoked. This attribute is primarily informational and used for documentation purposes.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.CollisionManifold
files.Summary: Represents a contact manifold between two convex shapes, storing up to six contact points.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.ConvexPolytope
files.Summary: Represents a convex polytope builder used in the Expanding Polytope Algorithm (EPA) for computing penetration depth and contact information.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.DynamicTree.Node
files.Summary: Represents a node in the AABB tree.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.DynamicTree.RayCastFilterPost
files.Summary: Delegate for filtering ray cast results after the shape intersection test.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.DynamicTree.RayCastFilterPre
files.Summary: Delegate for filtering ray cast candidates before the shape intersection test.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.DynamicTree.RayCastResult
files.Summary: Represents the result of a ray cast against the dynamic tree.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.DynamicTree.Timings
files.Summary: Profiling buckets for , representing stages of .

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.DynamicTree
files.Summary: Represents a dynamic AABB tree for broadphase collision detection.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.IBroadPhaseFilter
files.Summary: Provides a hook into the broadphase collision detection pipeline.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.IDynamicTreeProxy
files.Summary: Represents an entity that can be tracked by the for broadphase collision detection.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.INarrowPhaseFilter
files.Summary: Provides a hook into the narrowphase collision detection pipeline.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.IRayCastable
files.Summary: Represents an entity that can be intersected by a ray.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.ISupportMappable
files.Summary: Defines an interface for a generic convex shape characterized by its support function.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.IUpdatableBoundingBox
files.Summary: Represents an entity whose bounding box can be recomputed.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.Island
files.Summary: Represents an island, which is a collection of bodies that are either directly or indirectly in contact with each other.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.MinkowskiDifference.Vertex
files.Summary: Represents a vertex on the Minkowski difference of two shapes.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.MinkowskiDifference
files.Summary: Provides methods for computing points on the Minkowski difference of two convex shapes.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.NarrowPhase
files.Summary: Provides collision detection algorithms for convex shapes defined by support functions.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.Shapes.BoxShape
files.Summary: Represents a three-dimensional box shape.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.Shapes.CapsuleShape
files.Summary: Represents a capsule shape defined by a radius and the length of its cylindrical section.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.Shapes.ConeShape
files.Summary: Represents a cone shape defined by a base radius and height.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.Shapes.ConvexHullShape
files.Summary: Represents a convex hull shape defined by a set of triangles.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.Shapes.CylinderShape
files.Summary: Represents a cylinder shape defined by a height and radius.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.Shapes.ICloneableShape<T>
files.Summary: Defines a method to create a new instance of a shape for use with another rigid body.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.Shapes.PointCloudShape
files.Summary: Represents a convex hull shape defined by a point cloud. Unlike , it is not necessary for the points to lie on the convex hull. For performance optimization, this shape should ideally be used for a small number of points (~300).

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.Shapes.RigidBodyShape
files.Summary: Represents the abstract base class for shapes that can be attached to a rigid body.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.Shapes.Shape
files.Summary: The main entity of the collision system. Implements for narrow-phase and for broad-phase collision detection. The shape itself does not have a position or orientation. Shapes can be associated with instances of .

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.Shapes.ShapeHelper
files.Summary: Provides helper methods for calculating the properties of implicitly defined shapes.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.Shapes.SphereShape
files.Summary: Represents a sphere.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.Shapes.TransformedShape
files.Summary: Represents a shape wrapper defined by an original shape and an affine transformation (translation and linear map).

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.Shapes.TriangleMesh
files.Summary: Represents a triangle mesh defined by a collection of vertices and triangle indices.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.Shapes.TriangleShape
files.Summary: Represents a triangle shape defined by a reference to a and an index.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.Shapes.VertexSupportMap
files.Summary: Implements a SIMD accelerated support map for a set of vertices.

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.SimplexSolver
files.Summary: Implements the Gilbert-Johnson-Keerthi (GJK) simplex solver for finding the closest point to the origin on a simplex (point, line segment, triangle, or tetrahedron).

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.SimplexSolverAb
files.Summary: Implements the Gilbert-Johnson-Keerthi (GJK) simplex solver with support for retrieving the closest points on the original shapes (A and B spaces).

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.TreeBox
files.Summary: Represents an axis-aligned bounding box with SIMD-friendly memory layout, used for spatial partitioning in acceleration structures such as .

files.Title: Jitter2.Collision.TriangleEdgeCollisionFilter
files.Summary: Filters internal edge collisions for triangle mesh geometry.

files.Title: Jitter2.DataStructures.IPartitionedSetIndex
files.Summary: Defines an index property used by to track element positions.

files.Title: Jitter2.DataStructures.PartitionedSet<T>
files.Summary: Represents a collection of objects that can be partitioned into active and inactive subsets.

files.Title: Jitter2.DataStructures.ReadOnlyHashSet<T>
files.Summary: A read-only wrapper around that prevents modification while allowing enumeration and lookup.

files.Title: Jitter2.DataStructures.ReadOnlyList<T>
files.Summary: A read-only wrapper around that prevents modification while allowing indexed access and enumeration.

files.Title: Jitter2.DataStructures.ReadOnlyPartitionedSet<T>
files.Summary: A read-only wrapper around .

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Arbiter
files.Summary: Manages contact information between two different rigid bodies.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.ArbiterKey
files.Summary: Represents an ordered pair of identifiers used to look up an .

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.AngularLimit
files.Summary: Represents an angular limit defined by a minimum and maximum angle. Used by constraints to restrict rotational motion within a specified range.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.AngularMotor
files.Summary: Represents a motor that drives relative angular velocity between two axes fixed in the reference frames of their respective bodies.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.BallSocket
files.Summary: Implements a ball-and-socket joint that anchors a point on each body together, removing three translational degrees of freedom.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.ConeLimit
files.Summary: Limits the relative tilt between two bodies, removing one angular degree of freedom when active.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.Constraint<T>
files.Summary: Generic base class for constraints that store custom data of type T.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.Constraint
files.Summary: Base class for constraints that connect two rigid bodies and restrict their relative motion.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.ConstraintData
files.Summary: Low-level data for constraints, stored in unmanaged memory.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.DistanceLimit
files.Summary: Constrains the distance between a fixed point in the reference frame of one body and a fixed point in the reference frame of another body. This constraint removes one translational degree of freedom. For a distance of zero, use the constraint.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.FixedAngle
files.Summary: Constrains the relative orientation between two bodies, eliminating three degrees of rotational freedom.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.HingeAngle
files.Summary: Constrains two bodies to rotate relative to each other around a single axis, removing two angular degrees of freedom. Optionally enforces angular limits.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.HingeJoint
files.Summary: Constructs a hinge joint utilizing a , a , and an optional .

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.Joint
files.Summary: Base class for joints, which are composite constraints built from multiple instances.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.LinearLimit
files.Summary: Represents a linear limit defined by a minimum and maximum distance. Used by constraints to restrict translational motion within a specified range.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.LinearMotor
files.Summary: A motor constraint that drives relative translational velocity along an axis fixed in the reference frame of each body.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.PointOnLine
files.Summary: Constrains a fixed point in the reference frame of one body to a line that is fixed in the reference frame of another body. This constraint removes two degrees of translational freedom; three if the limit is enforced.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.PointOnPlane
files.Summary: Constrains a fixed point in the reference frame of one body to a plane that is fixed in the reference frame of another body. This constraint removes one degree of translational freedom if the limit is enforced.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.PrismaticJoint
files.Summary: Constructs a prismatic joint utilizing a constraint in conjunction with , , and constraints.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.SmallConstraintData
files.Summary: Low-level data for constraints that fit within bytes.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.TwistAngle
files.Summary: Constrains the relative twist of two bodies. This constraint removes one angular degree of freedom when the limit is enforced.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.UniversalJoint
files.Summary: Creates a universal joint utilizing a , , and an optional constraint.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.Constraints.WeldJoint
files.Summary: Creates a rigid weld joint between two bodies using a constraint for orientation locking and a constraint for positional locking. This effectively removes all relative motion between the connected bodies.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.ContactData.Contact.Flags
files.Summary: Flags indicating contact state.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.ContactData.Contact
files.Summary: Represents a single contact point between two rigid bodies.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.ContactData.SolveMode
files.Summary: Specifies which velocity components the solver should update for each body.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.ContactData
files.Summary: Holds up to four structs for a single shape-to-shape collision.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.MotionType
files.Summary: Specifies how a rigid body participates in the simulation.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.RigidBody
files.Summary: Represents the primary entity in the Jitter physics world.

files.Title: Jitter2.Dynamics.RigidBodyData
files.Summary: Low-level simulation state for a , stored in unmanaged memory.

files.Title: Jitter2.IDebugDrawable
files.Summary: Defines an interface for objects that can be debug-drawn.

files.Title: Jitter2.IDebugDrawer
files.Summary: Defines an interface for drawing debug visualization elements.

files.Title: Jitter2.LinearMath.JAngle
files.Summary: A floating point variable of type representing an angle. This structure exists to eliminate ambiguity between radians and degrees in the Jitter API.

files.Title: Jitter2.LinearMath.JBoundingBox.ContainmentType
files.Summary: Describes how one bounding box relates to another spatially.

files.Title: Jitter2.LinearMath.JBoundingBox
files.Summary: Represents an axis-aligned bounding box (AABB), a rectangular bounding box whose edges are parallel to the coordinate axes.

files.Title: Jitter2.LinearMath.JMatrix
files.Summary: Represents a 3x3 matrix with components of type .

files.Title: Jitter2.LinearMath.JQuaternion
files.Summary:
A structure representing a Quaternion: Q = xi + yj + z*k + w.
Uses the Hamilton convention where i = j = k = ijk = -1.

files.Title: Jitter2.LinearMath.JTriangle.CullMode
files.Summary: Specifies the face culling mode for triangles based on their winding order. Counter-clockwise (CCW) winding is considered front-facing.

files.Title: Jitter2.LinearMath.JTriangle
files.Summary: Represents a triangle defined by three vertices.

files.Title: Jitter2.LinearMath.JVector
files.Summary: Represents a three-dimensional vector with components of type .

files.Title: Jitter2.LinearMath.MathHelper
files.Summary: Provides mathematical helper methods for linear algebra and physics calculations.

files.Title: Jitter2.Logger.LogLevel
files.Summary: Defines the severity levels for logging messages.

files.Title: Jitter2.Logger
files.Summary: Provides logging functionality.

files.Title: Jitter2.Parallelization.Parallel.Batch
files.Summary: Represents a batch defined by a start index, an end index, and a batch index. This struct is utilized in to facilitate multithreaded batch processing within a for-loop.

files.Title: Jitter2.Parallelization.Parallel
files.Summary: Provides methods and structures for parallel batch processing within the Jitter physics engine.

files.Title: Jitter2.Parallelization.ParallelExtensions
files.Summary: Provides parallel batch processing extension methods for collections used by the physics engine.

files.Title: Jitter2.Parallelization.ReaderWriterLock
files.Summary: Provides a lightweight reader-writer lock optimized for rare write operations.

files.Title: Jitter2.Parallelization.ThreadPool
files.Summary: Provides a persistent worker thread pool for parallel task execution within the physics engine.

files.Title: Jitter2.Precision
files.Summary: Provides constants and utilities related to floating-point precision configuration. The library can be compiled with single-precision (float) or double-precision (double) by defining the USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION symbol.

files.Title: Jitter2.ReferenceFrame
files.Summary: Enum representing reference frames.

files.Title: Jitter2.ReferenceFrameAttribute
files.Summary: Attribute to specify the reference frame of a member.

files.Title: Jitter2.SoftBodies.BroadPhaseCollisionFilter
files.Summary: A broad-phase filter that handles collisions involving soft body shapes. It delegates collision detection to the narrow phase and registers contacts with the closest rigid body vertices of the soft body.

files.Title: Jitter2.SoftBodies.DynamicTreeCollisionFilter
files.Summary: Provides a collision filter that prevents self-collisions within soft bodies and shapes attached to the same rigid body.

files.Title: Jitter2.SoftBodies.SoftBody
files.Summary: Represents a soft body in the physics simulation. A soft body is composed of vertices (rigid bodies), springs (constraints), and shapes.

files.Title: Jitter2.SoftBodies.SoftBodyShape
files.Summary: Abstract base class for shapes used in soft body simulations.

files.Title: Jitter2.SoftBodies.SoftBodyTetrahedron
files.Summary: Represents a tetrahedral shape in a soft body simulation.

files.Title: Jitter2.SoftBodies.SoftBodyTriangle
files.Summary: Represents a triangular shape in a soft body simulation.

files.Title: Jitter2.SoftBodies.SpringConstraint.SpringData
files.Summary: Low-level data for the spring constraint, stored in unmanaged memory.

files.Title: Jitter2.SoftBodies.SpringConstraint
files.Summary: Constrains two bodies to maintain a target distance between anchor points, applying spring-like forces. Removes one translational degree of freedom along the line connecting the anchors.

files.Title: Jitter2.ThreadContext
files.Summary: Specifies the threading context in which code executes or a callback is invoked.

files.Title: Jitter2.Unmanaged.JHandle<T>
files.Summary: Handle for an unmanaged object stored in a . The handle remains stable even when the underlying memory is resized.

files.Title: Jitter2.Unmanaged.MemoryHelper.IsolatedInt
files.Summary: Represents an integer value isolated in memory to prevent false sharing between multiple threads operating on adjacent data.

files.Title: Jitter2.Unmanaged.MemoryHelper.MemBlock12Real
files.Summary: A memory block with a size equivalent to twelve instances of the type.

files.Title: Jitter2.Unmanaged.MemoryHelper.MemBlock16Real
files.Summary: A memory block with a size equivalent to sixteen instances of the type.

files.Title: Jitter2.Unmanaged.MemoryHelper.MemBlock6Real
files.Summary: A memory block with a size equivalent to six instances of the type.

files.Title: Jitter2.Unmanaged.MemoryHelper.MemBlock9Real
files.Summary: A memory block with a size equivalent to nine instances of the type.

files.Title: Jitter2.Unmanaged.MemoryHelper
files.Summary: Provides helper methods for allocating and managing unmanaged memory.

files.Title: Jitter2.Unmanaged.PartitionedBuffer<T>.MaximumSizeException
files.Summary: Exception thrown when the buffer's internal indirection table reaches its maximum capacity.

files.Title: Jitter2.Unmanaged.PartitionedBuffer<T>
files.Summary: Manages memory for unmanaged structs, storing them sequentially in contiguous memory blocks. Each struct can either be active or inactive.

files.Title: Jitter2.World.InvalidCollisionTypeException
files.Summary: Thrown when the narrow phase encounters a pair of proxy types it cannot process.

files.Title: Jitter2.World.SpanData
files.Summary: Provides access to objects in unmanaged memory. This operation is potentially unsafe.

files.Title: Jitter2.World.ThreadModelType
files.Summary: Controls how internal worker threads behave between calls to .

files.Title: Jitter2.World.Timings
files.Summary: Profiling buckets for , representing stages of .

files.Title: Jitter2.World.WorldStep
files.Summary: Delegate for per-step and per-substep callbacks.

files.Title: Jitter2.World
files.Summary: Represents a simulation environment that holds and manages the state of all simulation objects.
